trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods for composing a <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteValue" name="RouteValue" href=""></xref> expression at design time.
A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], uses the RouteValueExpressionEditor class to compose a `RouteValue` markup expression.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.RouteValueExpressionEditor"></xref> class.
Evaluates a <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteValue" name="RouteValue" href=""></xref> expression and provides the design-time value.
The visual designer uses the EvaluateExpression method to evaluate a `RouteValue` expression and to provide the design-time value for an associated control property.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteValue" name="RouteValue" href=""></xref> expression to evaluate.
The expression does not include the <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteValue" name="RouteValue" href=""></xref> expression prefix.
An object that contains additional parsing information that is used to evaluate the expression.
The type of the control property.
A service provider implementation that is supplied by the designer host and that is used to obtain additional design-time services.
The value of the specified URL parameter if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Returns an expression editor sheet for a <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteValue" name="RouteValue" href=""></xref> expression.
The GetExpressionEditorSheet method returns an editor-sheet implementation for `RouteValue` expressions.
The editor sheet for `RouteValue` expressions enables users to select a URL parameter.
After users have selected the parameter, the editor-sheet implementation generates a `RouteValue` expression that is returned to the visual designer.
The expression string that is used to initialize the expression editor sheet.
The expression does not include the <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteValue" name="RouteValue" href=""></xref> expression prefix.
A service provider implementation that is supplied by the designer host and that is used to obtain additional design-time services.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.RouteValueExpressionEditorSheet"></xref> instance that defines the <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteValue" name="RouteValue" href=""></xref> expression properties.
